title: Breaking Ties: Lido Finance to Exit Solana Blockchain in Major Move, Is SOL at Risk?
description: Lido Finance has decided to phase out operations on Solana. This marks another blockchain shifting base from one protocol to the other. Renowned multi-platform staking solution Lido Finance has announced plans to discontinue operations on the Solana blockchain. The decision was made after a rigorous Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) forum discussion and a voting process that involved [...]

title: XRP Price Could Exceed $10,000 Due to Worldwide Debt! RNT up 3,000%
description: In 2021, Ripple unveiled a groundbreaking announcement that had the potential to revolutionize XRP, its native cryptocurrency. The company introduced a dedicated XRP ledger (XRPL) tailored specifically for Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs). This strategic move aimed to position cryptocurrencies as a “neutral bridge asset” for seamless value transfer between CBDCs and other currencies, offering [...]
